description: This Dart file defines a database helper class 'DatabaseHelper' that manages SQLite database operations for a baby names application. It includes methods to initialize the database, create tables and indexes, seed initial data with baby names across multiple languages and Rashi categories, and close the database connection.

classes.name: DatabaseHelper
classes.description: A singleton class providing methods to manage SQLite database lifecycle, schema creation, data seeding, and access for baby names data.

methods.name: database
methods.description: Getter that asynchronously returns the singleton database instance, initializing it if necessary.

methods.name: _initDatabase
methods.description: Initializes the database by setting its path, creating schema, and seeding initial data.

methods.name: _onCreate
methods.description: Creates the 'baby_names' table and indexes, and seeds initial data upon database creation.

methods.name: _seedData
methods.description: Inserts predefined baby name records into the database to provide initial seed data.

methods.name: close
methods.description: Closes the database connection and resets the singleton instance.
